General.Name: Kuen Ling Refrigerating Machinery Co Ltd
General.Description: Kuen Ling Machinery Refrigerating Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of ice water main units and air-conditioning equipment in Taiwan and internationally. It offers water cooled and air-cooled ice water, computer room box, and hot and cold water machines; ice storage tanks; vacuum dryers; freezing and refrigerating and open screw compressor units; air coolers and direct expansion air conditioners; and direct expansion inverter air conditioning units; and ice water cooler and condensers. The company also provides OEM and ODM services for air-conditioning equipment manufacturers. Its products are used in office and commercial buildings, hospitals, and schools. The company was founded in 1977 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 300, Chikan North Road, Kaohsiung, Taiwan
